creator: info@demand.nu
text:
When i from a form post ;ping och %ping i get HTTP 501 and HTTP 505.
The way i found this was when i posted Linköping swedish char o with dots and got this error. So the problem is also with swedish chars before the word ping.

creator: info@demand.nu
text:
mod_security installed therefore this occured.
Edited modsecurity_crs_40_generic_attacks.conf

SecRule ARGS
was; p(?:asswd|ython|erl|ing|s)
edited; p(?:asswd|ython|erl|iing|s)

For some reaseon swedish chars in conclution with ping are detected as a commad injection. There for swedish towns like Linköping, Norrköping and Köping are detected as command injection.
marking invalid, this tracker is not used for third-party module mod_security.
creator: covener@gmail.com
